h2_title: Bishui Cave - Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
content: Once you've entered Bishui Cave, you can find the first of the two bosses just after the Purge Pit Keeper's Shrine.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Chapter 5 Secrets" and the sub-section "Bishui Cave - Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top". The content is presented below:

Once you've entered Bishui Cave, you can find the first of the two bosses just after the Purge Pit Keeper's Shrine.
